text: Schierokauer, Schirokauer is surname of: * Alfred Schirokauer (1880 in Breslau - 1934 in Vienna), German writer * Auguste Pünkösdy, aka Auguste Schirokauer- Pünkösdy (1890, Vienna – 1967), Austrian actress * Arno Schirokauer, fully Arnold Fritz Kurt Schirokauer (1899, Cottbus – 1954), Jewish German writer and Germanist * Conrad Schirokauer, American historian * Robert Schirokauer Hartman (1910, Berlin - 1973), German-American logician and philosopher Category:German-language surnames Category:Jewish surnames Category:Surnames of Polish origin Category:Surnames of Silesian origin Category:Yiddish- language surnames
title: Schierokauer
